body:
Have a prevent 1 damage effect in play (such as from Hedron-Field Purists).

Attack with a 9/7, block with a 3/3 and 5/5. Attacker deals 2 to 3/3 and 4 to 5/5 after damage prevention. 1 point of damage is missing.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: not enough damage is dealt when prevent damage effect is active
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on December 22, 2012 13:17:51_

Have a prevent 1 damage effect in play (such as from Hedron-Field Purists).

Attack with a 9/7, block with a 3/3 and 5/5. Attacker deals 2 to 3/3 and 4 to 5/5 after damage prevention. 1 point of damage is missing.
